name: rockt
description:
what is this

this is a lil game made in slightly under 3 hours for the trijam jam, a gamejam where you make a game in under 3 hours.

what to do

navigate a lil rocket ship around a maze and try not to bump into any walls. the longer you survive, the higher the final score will be.

controls

A+D / arrow keys - steer the rocket ship left or right.

lore

the lore behind this game and its universe is too tremendous to fit here, so i won't even try.

how it fits the trijam 185 theme

it doesn't, because i forgor about the theme :( sorry
